channel.title: Merch Competition
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474086.0.html
^ Got the idea from here. Who would be interested in having a merch competition for runescape?
How it would work: Trade X Amount of money to a level 3 account and that is all you have to work with. Everyone starts with X amount of money. No merch clans, everything is solo however you can merch items that merch clans are using. First person to x amount of money wins? Or after x amount of days.
Really the only way for this to work is honesty. If your honest and really just want to have some fun let me know.
Discuss.

item.title: Merch Competition
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Only way to do this in a good way, is by documenting every transaction (Time, Price, Item and Buy/Sell)

Read full topic

item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Yeah with free trade coming someone is bound to cheat. Iâ€™ve already done this on a few level 3s though just to see what I could do, and after starting with around 25-30k I had made just over 5m after a few weeks
